Solar panels: Install solar panels on the roof or walls of your home or workplace to generate your own electricity. This can be used to power lights, appliances, and other electronic devices.
LED lights: Switch to LED lights, which are more energy-efficient and last longer than traditional incandescent bulbs.
Solar-powered chargers: Use solar-powered chargers to charge your phone, laptop, and other electronic devices.
Battery-powered lanterns: Keep battery-powered lanterns around your home or workplace to provide additional light during the day.
Natural light: Open up the curtains and blinds to let in as much natural light as possible. This can be especially helpful if you have large windows or skylights.
